sourcesContent:
<template lang='pug'>
  #app {{ data }}
</template>

<script>
const axios = require('axios')
import HelloWorld from './components/HelloWorld.vue'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  data () {
    return {
      data: {},
      sources: [
        'https://www.cbr-xml-daily.ru/daily_utf8.xml',
        'https://www.cbr-xml-daily.ru/daily_json.js'
      ]
    }
  },
  components: {
    HelloWorld
  },
  mounted: function() {
    const self = this;
    const source = this.sources.map(function(source) {
      return source
    });
    
    console.log(source)

    axios.all(self.sources).then(axios.spread((...responses) => {
      responses.forEach((item, index) => console.log(item.data))
    })).catch(errors => {
      // react on errors.
      console.log(errors)
    })
  }
}
</script>

<style lang='stylus'>
#app
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale
  text-align: center
  color: #2c3e50
  margin-top: 60px
</style>
